snippet: Coachella, the popular Southern California music festival, is heading out to sea on two cruises in December, said the concert promoter behind the festival.
abstract: Coachella music festival plans two Caribbean cruises featuring performances by many popular acts.
lead_paragraph: Coachella, the popular Southern California music festival, is heading out to sea on two cruises in December, said the concert promoter behind the festival.

headline.seo: Coachella Festival Will Go to Sea on Cruise Ship in December
headline.main: From Desert to Cruise Ship: Coachella Heads to Sea
headline.print_headline: From Desert to Cruise Ship: Coachella Heads to Sea

keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
